response.overview: The idea with HUMAN was to create songs that would reflect the same emotion generated by the interviews. I wanted things to open up, to open up oneâ€™s heart, to let the sadness be without any restraint. HUMAN has been one of these rare moments in my life as a film composer during which I could express all these different cultures at the same time : either working on minimalist songs or meeting with these singers and musicians coming from all around the world. Which note did I first produce ? I had more like a global vision in mind, an atmosphere that would merge into the film and that would bring people together, this was my starting point. The part I created for the Mongolian sequence might be the best summary of the atmosphere I wanted the film to have
response.tagline: I am deeply taken with traditional music, it moves me, it connects you to emotion.
response.title: Human's Music
